text: Spooky Records is a garage and rock record label formed in Melbourne, Australia by Loki Lockwood in 1999. Artists who have albums released under the Spooky label include Graveyard Train, Spencer P. Jones, The Beasts of Bourbon, The Drones, Six Ft Hick ==Artists== * Spencer P. Jones * Graveyard Train * Six Ft Hick * Digger and the Pussycats * Gentle Ben and his Sensitive Side * King Daddy * Sailors and Swine * Sun God Replica * The Blacklist * Harry Howard and the NDE * The Toot Toot Toots * The Drones * The Stabs * Hugo Race and True Spirit * The Devastations * Tri-State Lovers * Scourge * Buried Horses * The Double Agents == See also == * List of record labels ==External links== * Official site Category:Australian record labels Category:Record labels established in 2002 Category:Garage rock record labels Category:Rock record labels Category:2002 establishments in Australia Category:Record labels based in Melbourne
title: Spooky Records
